text:
1. Put on ski boots
2. Attach skis to boots
3. Hold ski poles
4. Stand upright on skis
5. Bend knees and lean forward
6. Push off with poles to start moving
7. Glide down the slope
8. Shift weight from side to side to turn
9. Maintain balance and control
10. Slow down or stop by applying pressure to skis
11. Repeat steps 6-10 as necessary
12. Remove skis and boots at the end of skiing session
